Hamfest 2017

The Best Hamfest in Georgia

Event Details

ARRL Sanctioned VE Testing (At nearby Western Sizzlin) Boneyard Concessions

Admission

$5 at the gate. Free Parking.

Talk In

The Dalton Amateur Radio Club sponsors an open repeater on the top of Fort Mountain, nearby to Dalton. Club operators will be standing by to direct you in from Interstate 75.

Frequency Offset Tone
2-Meter 145.230 Mhz FM -600 kHz 141.3 Hz

Vendors

Contact Tom Smith, KI4IG at 706 581-3350 or email W4DRC@yahoo.com regarding tables.

Dalton Amateur Radio Club

Seeking to advance the state of art and science of amateur radio communications through education, training, experimentation, and research. Promoting the free interchange of technical information among and between amateur radio operators and the general public. Evento
